actions.text: Amendment SA 15 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 17.

Amendment SA 15 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S574-575; text: CR S574-575) To more quickly resolve rape cases and reduce the deficit by consolidating unnecessary duplication within the Department of Justice.

purpose: To more quickly resolve rape cases and reduce the deficit by consolidating unnecessary duplication within the Department of Justice.
